metadata.Title: CVE-2018-11730 on Ubuntu 20.04 FIPS Certified (focal) - low
metadata.Description:
** DISPUTED ** The libfsntfs_security_descriptor_values_free function inlibfsntfs_security_descriptor_values.c in libfsntfs through 2018-04-20allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (double-free) via acrafted ntfs file. NOTE: the vendor has disputed this as described inlibyal/libfsntfs issue 8 on GitHub.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2018-11730` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libfsntfs-utils - 20190104-1
libfsntfs1 - 20190104-1
python-libfsntfs - 20190104-1
python3-libfsntfs - 20190104-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: libfsntfs package in focal, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '20190104-1').
